text: Pyotr Gornushko (born 12 July 1953) is a Russian equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male equestrians Category:Soviet male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of the Soviet Union Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rostov Oblast
title: Pyotr Gornushko
